head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths JESSUP, HENRY HERBERT, JR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths JESSUP, HENRY HERBERT, JR.

block.p: JESSUP-Henry Herbert, Jr. died peacefully July 19, 2000 at the age of eighty-two at Ron Calli Health Center in Waterford, CT. Beloved husband of Diane Jessup and stepfather of Elisabeth. Loving father of William, Henry, Martyn and Eugenia and grandfather of Brooks, Alex, Olivia, Audrey, Katie, Kelly and Christopher, and brother of John Baker Jessup. Yale graduate 1940, J. Walter Thompson executive, avid sailor, great swimmer, and reader. A memorial service will be held on July 31st, 11:30 am at Christ Church, Greenwich, CT. Memorial contributions to Ron Calli Sunshine Fund in memory of Henry H. Jessup, Jr., 7 Rope Ferry Road, Waterford, CT. 06385.
